channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US conducts 17th lethal strike against alleged drug boat
item.description: The United States has conducted its 17th lethal strike against a suspected drug vessel, killing all three on board, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth sai...

item.title: Trump administration asks appeals court to immediately halt ruling on SNAP funding
item.description: The Trump administration has asked a federal appeals court to issue an emergency stay of a judge's ruling Thursday ordering the administration to full...

item.title: WATCH: Woman rescues baby shark washed up on Oregon beach
item.description: She said the animal swam away after being returned to the sea.

item.title: Crews are working to fix Alaska Native villages devastated by flooding. But will residents return?
Why young people, newcomers to NYC voted for Mamdani
item.description: Exit polls revealed Mamdani captured the majority of votes from the younger population and newcomers to the city.

item.title: Trump administration seeks to halt SNAP food aid payments after a court order
Senate readies key vote on new approach to end shutdown
item.description: The government shutdown is now on Day 38 as the Senate prepares to vote again, but bipartisan progress has appeared to stall. Follow live updates here...

item.title: House Democrats ask former Prince Andrew to take questions about Epstein
item.description: Democrats on the House Oversight Committee want King Charles' younger brother Andrew to undergo "a transcribed interview" about Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: FAA order cutting thousands of flights kicks in as airlines scramble to comply
item.description: The FAA ordered airlines to cut thousands of flights as the agency deals with air traffic controller shortages during the government shutdown. The cut...

item.title: Vaccine Court | Sunday on 60 Minutes
item.description: If you’ve never heard of the national vaccine court, you’re not alone. It’s paid out billions to Americans who have suffered rare injuries after vacci...

item.title: Travelers face cancellations and frustration as the FAA orders flight cuts due to the shutdown
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration’s order to scale back flights nationwide because of the government shutdown is now in effect.

item.title: Man discovers gold worth $800,000 buried in his garden
item.description: The man informed the local authorities after he made the discovery, and they allowed him to keep the gold.

item.title: Airlines cancel hundreds of flights Friday amid shutdown-related FAA reductions
item.description: Major airlines say they are planning to cancel hundreds of flights on Friday -- out of thousands of daily flights -- as the FAA is set to begin limiti...
